info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: LYE Lin-Heng

publications.text: "Environmental Law - Singapore", International Encyclopaedia of Laws, Wolters Kluwer, 2013, pp. 1-156
Chapter on Singapore's Environmental Law, in Comparative Environmental Law and Regulation, E Burleson, Lye Lin-Heng and N Robinson, eds., 2013, 1-78
"The Judiciary and Environmental Governance in Singapore", Journal of Court Innovation: The Role of the Environmental Judiciary, Vol. 3 No. 1, Winter 2010, pp 133-155
"Land Law and the Environment - Re-examining the Concept of Ownership and Forging New Rights and Obligations in a Changed World", (2010) SAcLJ 189-229

"Environmental Taxation in the Management of Road Traffic in Singapore", in Lin-Heng Lye, Janet E Milne, Hope Ashiabor, Larry Kreiser, Kurt Deketelaere. Eds., Critical Issues in Environmental Taxation - International and Comparative Perspectives, Vol. VII, Oxford University Press, (2009), 205-225
